title: Rizal Ancestral House
caption: The Bahay na Bato in Calamba where Rizal spent his childhood, now preserved as a national shrine.
credit: National Historical Commission of the Philippines

title: Dapitan Shrine
caption: Replica structures in Dapitan illustrating Rizal's exile estate and civic projects from 1892 to 1896.

title: Mi Último Adiós Manuscript
caption: Facsimile of Rizal's farewell poem, hidden in an alcohol stove and recovered after his execution.

title: Luneta Monument
caption: The Rizal Monument in Luneta Park, unveiled in 1913, honoring his martyrdom and national hero status.
